sentences.english: Thymidine kinase gene is found in herpes simplex virus.
sentences.chinese: 胸苷激酶基因被发现在单纯疱疹病毒。

sentences.english: Produced nattokinase in liquid fermentation of Bacillus natto I.
sentences.chinese: 利用纳豆菌I液体发酵生产纳豆激酶。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To research the fermentation and the capsule preparation techniques of nattokinase.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究纳豆激酶的发酵及其胶囊的制备工艺。

sentences.english: In this experiment, the serum TNF - a.
sentences.chinese: 在本实验中，应用尿激酶后血清TNF一。

sentences.english: The content of liver glycogen and the activity of liver glucokinase were studied.
sentences.chinese: 实验结束后取肝脏测定糖原含量和葡萄糖激酶活性。

sentences.english: When wheat plants allowed to become deficient in potassium, pyruvate kinase activity increased.
sentences.chinese: 当小麦植株令其缺钾时，丙酮酸激酶活性随之升高。

sentences.english: Next we will determine Akt kinase inhibitory activity of these compounds.
sentences.chinese: 下一步将测定化合物对Akt激酶的抑制活性。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of intrapleural urokinase in the treatment of pleural thickening and loculated pleural effusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察胸腔内注射尿激酶治疗结核性胸膜炎的效果。

sentences.english: The level of serum creatine kinase was slightly elevated.
sentences.chinese: 血清肌酸激酶轻度升高。

sentences.english: Malondialdehyde (MDA) and creatine kinase isoenzyme-MB (CK-MB) were measured.
sentences.chinese: 同时检测丙二醛含量和肌酸激酶同工酶活性。

sentences.english: Fibrinolytic therapy with streptokinase is less efficacious than previously believed.
sentences.chinese: 用链激酶溶栓治疗比先前想象的效果更差。

sentences.english: Genistein, which is an inhibitor of the growth receptor, tyrosine protein-kinase.
sentences.chinese: 是生长受体酪氨酸蛋白激酶抑制剂。

sentences.english: Isolating the banana like-receptor protein kinase(RPKs) gene of ripening-associated.
sentences.chinese: 香蕉类受体蛋白激酶的克隆。

sentences.english: Sunitinb is a novel multitargeted receptor tyrosine kinase inhibitor.
sentences.chinese: 苏尼替尼是一种新型的多靶点酪氨酸激酶抑制剂。

sentences.english: Perhaps the answer is to try a number of different kinase activators.
sentences.chinese: 可能需要尝试许多不同的激酶活化剂才能得到答案。

sentences.english: The method and technology of urokinase are studied here.
sentences.chinese: 该文对尿激酶纯化方法与技术进行了研究。
